vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 2170 for an open-enrollment charter school use on property zoned an RR Regional Retail District, on the north line of West Camp Wisdom Road and the west line of Interstate 35E Freeway
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval, subject to an amended site plan, amended traffic management plan, and amended conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval, subject to an amended site plan, amended traffic management plan, and amended conditions
Z234-246(LL)
